channel.title: Logitech G11 Keyboard G key problem
channel.description:
Okay my problem is this.. I have assigned a macro to my "g12" key... the macro is my email address When i click record it comes up like this when i enter my email:
FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRREEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE
I know it should be 2 of each letter (One for the pressing down of the key and one for the releasing of the key" So i delete the unnecessary keys. Now when i click it it still comes up like this (bearing in mind im pressing it once)
fireblade1050@hotmail.comfireblade1050@hotmail.comfireblade1050@hotmail.comfireblade1050@hotmail.comfireblade1050@hotmail.comfireblade1050@hotmail.comfireblade1050@hotmail.comfireblade1050@hotmail.comfireblade1050@hotmail.comfireblade1050@hotmail.comfireblade1050@hotmail.comfireblade1050@hotmail.comfireblade1050@hotmail.comfireblade1050@hotmail.comfireblade1050@hotmail.comfireblade1050@hotmail.comfireblade1050@hotmail.com
My email address is only in there once but it appears so many times. Also i click on "check for updates" and it says its up to date Any ideas?

item.title: Logitech G11 Keyboard G key problem

item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

G15 is different then G11 lol

item.title: Logitech G11 Keyboard G key problem
item.dc:creator: @shrogg shrogg
item.description:
@shrogg wrote:

i got a G15 keybord, and it dosent have that problem…
so im guessing you are recording it right?
as in: MR-[Gkey]-[key combo]-MR
i have my G15 mapped out for my minecraft server commands like “t/item”

item.title: Logitech G11 Keyboard G key problem

@Thebeanie wrote:

Okay my problem is this…

I have assigned a macro to my “g12” key…

the macro is my email address

When i click record it comes up like this when i enter my email:

FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRREEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE

I know it should be 2 of each letter (One for the pressing down of the key and one for the releasing of the key"
So i delete the unnecessary keys.

fireblade1050@hotmail.comfireblade1050@hotmail.comfireblade1050@hotmail.comfireblade1050@hotmail.comfireblade1050@hotmail.comfireblade1050@hotmail.comfireblade1050@hotmail.comfireblade1050@hotmail.comfireblade1050@hotmail.comfireblade1050@hotmail.comfireblade1050@hotmail.comfireblade1050@hotmail.comfireblade1050@hotmail.comfireblade1050@hotmail.comfireblade1050@hotmail.comfireblade1050@hotmail.comfireblade1050@hotmail.com
